summary: This document is an email from Amanda Kirby to Lisa D Hurd discussing the status of funds related to Southern Trust and Southern Financial. Amanda inquires whether 3PMorgan has reached out for any missing information regarding Southern Financial.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is an associate at Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas and is inquiring about the status of funds.

persons.name: Lisa D Hurd
persons.context: Lisa D Hurd is the recipient of the email from Amanda Kirby regarding financial matters.

connections.description: Amanda Kirby and Lisa D Hurd are colleagues communicating about financial transactions.

locations: 345 Park Avenue, 27th Fl, New York, NY, USA
keyFacts: Amanda Kirby is following up on the status of funds for Southern Financial.
The email indicates that funds for Southern Trust have been received.
Amanda is inquiring if 3PMorgan has requested any missing information regarding Southern Financial.
